analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#161-163) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#263-304)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#390-413)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#490-506)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#514-535)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#596-611) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#315-338):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(Controller(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#331-333)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#335-336)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#45-51) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#566) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#443-444)

MiniMeIrrevocableVestedToken.calculateVestedTokens.vestedTokens (local variable @ /unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#839-847) shadows:
	- MiniMeIrrevocableVestedToken.vestedTokens (function @ /unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#803-812)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#596-611)
	- /unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#603-609

MiniMeIrrevocableVestedToken.MAX_GRANTS_PER_ADDRESS should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#681-682)
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#132-133)
Controlled.changeController (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#69-76) should be declared external
Controller.proxyPayment (/unique_chucks/1/0x6ec8a24cabdc339a06a172f8223ea557055adaa5.sol#86-87) should be declared external
